name: Santa Clara County Library Digital Resources
description: Free digital resources including ebooks, audiobooks, databases, and online learning with Santa Clara County library card
fullDescription: Santa Clara County Library District offers free digital resources including ebooks, audiobooks, streaming content, and online learning for cardholders.
whatTheyOffer:
- Ebooks and audiobooks via Libby
- Streaming movies and music
- Online learning (LinkedIn Learning, Coursera)
- Research databases
- Digital magazines
- Language learning resources
howToGetIt:
1. Get a Santa Clara County Library card (free for residents)
2. Visit sccld.org/resource
3. Browse available digital resources
4. Sign in with your library card
5. Access content on any device
